# HealthData.gov
- Using the package `RSocrata`, you can easily access datasets using a single command
  - `df <- read.socrata("https://healthdata.gov/resource/g62h-syeh.json")` will import the dataset for Covid-19 Patient Impact and Hospital Capacity by State Timeseries
